channel.title: CVE Feed for HCL Software -- HCL Traveler To Do
channel.description: The latest CVEs for HCL Software -- HCL Traveler To Do

item.title: CVE-2023-37511|2024-10-04T13:06:22.893Z -- hcl%20software -- hcl%20traveler%20to%20do
item.description: If certain App Transport Security (ATS) settings are set in a certain manner, insecure loading of web content can be achieved.

item.title: CVE-2023-37513|2024-10-04T13:06:09.341Z -- hcl%20software -- hcl%20traveler%20to%20do
item.description: When the app is put to the background and the user goes to the task switcher of iOS, the app snapshot is not blurred which may reveal sensitive information.
